faqs.q: How to claim a winning lottery prize?
faqs.a: Prize can be claimed by submitting the winning ticket with ID proof at a nationalized bank or Lottery Directorate office.
You need the original ticket, self attested copies of ID proof, passport size photo, claim form and PAN card.
Official results are published on the Kerala Lottery website and in the Gazette.

faqs.q: How to verify if ticket is fake?
faqs.a: You can verify using this chatbot or visit the nearest Authorized Lottery Center.

faqs.q: Can I claim prize without PAN?
faqs.a: PAN card is mandatory if the prize exceeds â‚¹10,000.
